title: Google\Cloud\Logging\V2\ConfigServiceV2Api
name: ConfigServiceV2Api
description:
Service Description: Service for configuring sinks used to export log entries outside Stackdriver Logging.

This class provides the ability to make remote calls to the backing service through method calls that map to API methods. Sample code to get started:

try {
    $configServiceV2Api = new ConfigServiceV2Api();
    $formattedParent = ConfigServiceV2Api::formatParentName("[PROJECT]");
    foreach ($configServiceV2Api->listSinks($formattedParent) as $element) {
        // doThingsWith(element);
    }
} finally {
    if (isset($configServiceV2Api)) {
        $configServiceV2Api->close();
    }
}

Many parameters require resource names to be formatted in a particular way. To assist with these names, this class includes a format method for each type of name, and additionally a parse method to extract the individual identifiers contained within names that are returned.

methods.name: formatParentName
methods.description: Formats a string containing the fully-qualified path to represent a parent resource.

methods.name: formatSinkName
methods.description: Formats a string containing the fully-qualified path to represent a sink resource.

methods.name: parseProjectFromParentName
methods.description: Parses the project from the given fully-qualified path which represents a parent resource.

methods.name: parseProjectFromSinkName
methods.description: Parses the project from the given fully-qualified path which represents a sink resource.

methods.name: parseSinkFromSinkName
methods.description: Parses the sink from the given fully-qualified path which represents a sink resource.

params.name: options
params.description: Optional. Options for configuring the service API wrapper.

params.name: options.serviceAddress
params.description: The domain name of the API remote host. Default 'logging.googleapis.com'.

params.name: options.port
params.description: The port on which to connect to the remote host. Default 443.

params.name: options.sslCreds
params.description: A ChannelCredentials for use with an SSL-enabled channel. Default: a credentials object returned from Grpc\ChannelCredentials::createSsl()

params.name: options.scopes
params.description: A string array of scopes to use when acquiring credentials. Default the scopes for the Google Cloud Logging API.

params.name: options.retryingOverride
params.description: An associative array of string => RetryOptions, where the keys are method names (e.g. 'createFoo'), that overrides default retrying settings. A value of null indicates that the method in question should not retry.

params.name: options.timeoutMillis
params.description: The timeout in milliseconds to use for calls that don't use retries. For calls that use retries, set the timeout in RetryOptions. Default: 30000 (30 seconds)

params.name: options.appName
params.description: The codename of the calling service. Default 'gax'.

params.name: options.appVersion
params.description: The version of the calling service. Default: the current version of GAX.

params.name: options.credentialsLoader
params.description: A CredentialsLoader object created using the Google\Auth library.

methods.name: listSinks
methods.description:
Lists sinks.

Sample code:

try {
    $configServiceV2Api = new ConfigServiceV2Api();
    $formattedParent = ConfigServiceV2Api::formatParentName("[PROJECT]");
    foreach ($configServiceV2Api->listSinks($formattedParent) as $element) {
        // doThingsWith(element);
    }
} finally {
    if (isset($configServiceV2Api)) {
        $configServiceV2Api->close();
    }
}

params.name: parent
params.description: Required. The resource name containing the sinks. Example: "projects/my-logging-project".

params.name: optionalArgs
params.description: Optional.

params.name: optionalArgs.pageToken
params.description: A page token is used to specify a page of values to be returned. If no page token is specified (the default), the first page of values will be returned. Any page token used here must have been generated by a previous call to the API.

params.name: optionalArgs.pageSize
params.description: The maximum number of resources contained in the underlying API response. The API may return fewer values in a page, even if there are additional values to be retrieved.

params.name: optionalArgs.retrySettings
params.description: Retry settings to use for this call. If present, then $timeoutMillis is ignored.

params.name: optionalArgs.timeoutMillis
params.description: Timeout to use for this call. Only used if $retrySettings is not set.

methods.name: getSink
methods.description:
Gets a sink.

Sample code:

try {
    $configServiceV2Api = new ConfigServiceV2Api();
    $formattedSinkName = ConfigServiceV2Api::formatSinkName("[PROJECT]", "[SINK]");
    $response = $configServiceV2Api->getSink($formattedSinkName);
} finally {
    if (isset($configServiceV2Api)) {
        $configServiceV2Api->close();
    }
}

params.name: sinkName
params.description: The resource name of the sink to return. Example: "projects/my-project-id/sinks/my-sink-id".

params.name: optionalArgs
params.description: Optional.

params.name: optionalArgs.retrySettings
params.description: Retry settings to use for this call. If present, then $timeoutMillis is ignored.

params.name: optionalArgs.timeoutMillis
params.description: Timeout to use for this call. Only used if $retrySettings is not set.

methods.name: createSink
methods.description:
Creates a sink.

Sample code:

try {
    $configServiceV2Api = new ConfigServiceV2Api();
    $formattedParent = ConfigServiceV2Api::formatParentName("[PROJECT]");
    $sink = new LogSink();
    $response = $configServiceV2Api->createSink($formattedParent, $sink);
} finally {
    if (isset($configServiceV2Api)) {
        $configServiceV2Api->close();
    }
}

params.name: parent
params.description:
The resource in which to create the sink. Example: "projects/my-project-id".

The new sink must be provided in the request.

params.name: sink
params.description: The new sink, which must not have an identifier that already exists.

params.name: optionalArgs
params.description: Optional.

params.name: optionalArgs.retrySettings
params.description: Retry settings to use for this call. If present, then $timeoutMillis is ignored.

params.name: optionalArgs.timeoutMillis
params.description: Timeout to use for this call. Only used if $retrySettings is not set.

methods.name: updateSink
methods.description:
Creates or updates a sink.

Sample code:

try {
    $configServiceV2Api = new ConfigServiceV2Api();
    $formattedSinkName = ConfigServiceV2Api::formatSinkName("[PROJECT]", "[SINK]");
    $sink = new LogSink();
    $response = $configServiceV2Api->updateSink($formattedSinkName, $sink);
} finally {
    if (isset($configServiceV2Api)) {
        $configServiceV2Api->close();
    }
}

params.name: sinkName
params.description:
The resource name of the sink to update. Example: "projects/my-project-id/sinks/my-sink-id".

The updated sink must be provided in the request and have the same name that is specified in sinkName. If the sink does not exist, it is created.

params.name: sink
params.description: The updated sink, whose name must be the same as the sink identifier in sinkName. If sinkName does not exist, then this method creates a new sink.

params.name: optionalArgs
params.description: Optional.

params.name: optionalArgs.retrySettings
params.description: Retry settings to use for this call. If present, then $timeoutMillis is ignored.

params.name: optionalArgs.timeoutMillis
params.description: Timeout to use for this call. Only used if $retrySettings is not set.

methods.name: deleteSink
methods.description:
Deletes a sink.

Sample code:

try {
    $configServiceV2Api = new ConfigServiceV2Api();
    $formattedSinkName = ConfigServiceV2Api::formatSinkName("[PROJECT]", "[SINK]");
    $configServiceV2Api->deleteSink($formattedSinkName);
} finally {
    if (isset($configServiceV2Api)) {
        $configServiceV2Api->close();
    }
}

params.name: sinkName
params.description: The resource name of the sink to delete. Example: "projects/my-project-id/sinks/my-sink-id".

params.name: optionalArgs
params.description: Optional.

params.name: optionalArgs.retrySettings
params.description: Retry settings to use for this call. If present, then $timeoutMillis is ignored.

params.name: optionalArgs.timeoutMillis
params.description: Timeout to use for this call. Only used if $retrySettings is not set.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Initiates an orderly shutdown in which preexisting calls continue but new calls are immediately cancelled.
